snippet: The Court of Arbitration for Sport reduced the sailor Dirk de Ridder’s suspension from sanctioned events from three years to 18 months.
abstract: Court of Arbitration for Sport reduces suspension for sailor Dirk de Ridder to 18 months; De Ridder was suspended after he was said to be involved in manipulating weight distribution of boats in lead-up to 2013 America's Cup.
lead_paragraph: The Court of Arbitration for Sport reduced the sailor Dirk de Ridder’s suspension from sanctioned events from three years to 18 months.

headline.main: Suspension for Dirk de Ridder, a Sailor, Is Cut
